channel.title: fork on My technical gists
channel.description: Recent content in fork on My technical gists

item.title: Contribution guide to open source project - fork and pull request
item.description: Table of contents GitHub Fork & Pull Request GitHub Fork & Pull Request Fork the project you want to contribute Clone your fork to your local machine git clone git@github.com:USERNAME/FORKED-PROJECT.git Add ‘upstream’ repo to list of remotes git remote add upstream https://github.com/UPSTREAM-USER/ORIGINAL-PROJECT.git Verify the new remote named ‘upstream’ git remote -v Fetch from upstream remote git fetch upstream View all branches, including those from upstream git branch -va Checkout your master branch and merge upstream
